definition: another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check

sentences.english: Maybe I can tell you some other time.
sentences.chinese: 也許我會改天告訴你吧。

sentences.english: You find yourself putting off creating until another day.
sentences.chinese: 你發現創造被你放到一個個的“改天”。

sentences.english: I’m dory if my facile effort upset you. Come to the police facility someday and I’ll show you around.
sentences.chinese: 改天到警察署來，我帶你參觀。

sentences.english: Can't you go out with her another day?
sentences.chinese: 你不能改天再跟她出赴嗎？

sentences.english: Yangyang:I play the vilon. Let's play together sometime.
sentences.chinese: 我拉小提琴，改天咱們一起合奏吧。

sentences.english: One day you have an apartment, the next day it's a house of dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 今天你還擁有一間公寓，但改天也許就變成餃子館了。

sentences.english: A: Can't you go out with her another day?
sentences.chinese: 你不能改天再跟她出去嗎？

sentences.english: It seems three good methods, I will have a try.
sentences.chinese: 貌似不錯的三種方法，改天我嘗試下。

sentences.english: He decided to take her to school and try this again another day.
sentences.chinese: 他決定把女兒先送回學校，改天再來考駕照。
我們改天在戰網上聊吧。

sentences.english: If your father becomes angry, drop the subject and return to it another day.
sentences.chinese: 如果你父親生氣了，終止這個話題改天再來談論它。

sentences.english: Maybe we can see a movie some other time.
sentences.chinese: 也許我們改天再一起去看電影吧。

sentences.english: You may pay the friend back by inviting the friend to a restaurant some other time.
sentences.chinese: 改天你可以邀請朋友去餐館喫飯回請這位朋友。

sentences.english: If it was not, he would leave and come again another day.
sentences.chinese: 要是有人，他就調頭改天再來。

definition: in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
erhua variant of 等一會|等一会[deng3 yi1 hui4]
